      • stopKillRings

        public abstract void stopKillRings()
        We support 'kill rings' at the editor, i.e. every time when subsequent adjacent regions of text are copied they are combined into single compound region. Every non-adjacent change makes existing regions unable to combine.

        However, there are situations when all 'kill rings' should be stopped manually (e.g. on undo). Hence, we need a handle to ask for that. This method works like such a handle.

        See Also:
        KillRingTransferable
